channel.title: golang on Virtual Residency
channel.description: Recent content in golang on Virtual Residency

item.title: Week Two Report
item.description: As you can see, my young apprentice, your friends have failed. Now witness the firepower of this fully armed and operational battle station. Fire at will, Commander. Fire!

item.title: Week One Report
item.description: This can’t be! Artoo, you’re playing the wrong message. There will be no bargain. We’re doomed.
